name: Snowball Is Dead
description:
W or Up Arrow - Go forward

S  or Down Arrow- Stop

A or Left Arrow - Turn Left

D or Right Arrow - Turn Right

This is my first game, "Snowball Is Dead"! 

You play as snowball, a rabbit whose only goal is to survive as long as possible, eat rabbits to keep your hunger up, get the foxes trapped on rocks, and use your magical rabbit powers to go in one side of the screen and come out the other.

This game was supervised by Najam Haq
